name: Weekly Planning + Random Ideas
content:
üìÖ Week of March 18-22, 2024

=======================

Monday:

- [x] 9:30 Team standup

- [x] Review PR #234 (mobile navigation)

- [ ] Draft Q2 planning doc

- [x] 1:1 with Michael re: API changes

Tuesday:

- [ ] Finish user dashboard redesign

- [ ] 2:00 Client demo (ACME Corp)

- [ ] Review analytics data

Wednesday:

- [ ] Tech talk: GraphQL best practices

- [ ] Debug prod issue #567

- [ ] Update API documentation

Thursday:

- [ ] Architecture review meeting

- [ ] Finish v3.2 release notes

- [ ] Code review day

Friday:

- [ ] Team retrospective

- [ ] Clean up JIRA tickets

- [ ] Plan next sprint

üéØ Focus Areas:

- Mobile app performance

- Documentation improvements

- Team knowledge sharing

üí° Random Ideas & Notes:

- Try using Redis for session management?

- Faster than current DB solution

- Need to check memory usage

- Ask Sarah about her implementation

- Mobile app improvements:

* Offline mode for basic features

* Batch sync when connection restored

* Progressive image loading

- Team productivity ideas:

1. No-meeting Wednesdays?

2. Async standups in Slack

3. Better PR templates

üîç Research Topics:

* GraphQL subscriptions

* WebAssembly for data processing

* New React server components

üìö Reading List:

- https://martinfowler.com/articles/patterns-of-distributed-systems/

- https://web.dev/articles/performance-scoring

- Team recommended: \"Building Microservices\" (Sam Newman)

üé® UI/UX Ideas:

```css

/* New color scheme? */

.theme-2024 {

--primary: #2563eb;

--secondary: #3b82f6;

--accent: #60a5fa;

--background: #f8fafc;

}

```

Remember:

- Order more coffee for office

- Submit conference talk proposal

- Schedule dentist appointment

- Return library books
